text: Akasachijinjisyaga chilo m’muusi (ni kuleupa muusi kwipipa chilo mpela ndaŵi jachitukuta), ni akwinjisyaga soni muusi m’chilo (ni kuleupa chilo kwipipa muusi mpela ndaŵi jakusisima), ni alijepepesye lyuŵa ni mwesi, yosope ikwenda kwandema jakwe jekolanjidwe, Jwalakwe ni Allah M’mbuje gwenu, uchimwene ni Wakwe. Sano aŵala ŵankwaŵenda kunneka Jwalakwe nganakola (chindu chilichose namuno chamwana nti chisawu) chikoŵa cha lupele lwa tende
